org.apache.storm.flux.model

Class TopologyDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.flux.model.TopologyDef

  • public class TopologyDef
extends Object
    Bean represenation of a topology. It consists of the following: 1. The topology name 2. A `java.util.Map` representing the `backtype.storm.config` for the topology 3. A list of spout definitions 4. A list of bolt definitions 5. A list of stream definitions that define the flow between spouts and bolts.
